RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Diretora de Graduaзгo, Professora Associada, Coordenadora do Nъcleo de Sustentabilidade e Negуcios no Insper. Ocupou a Cбtedra Escolhas sobre Meio Ambiente (2016-2018). Foi co-chair do PRME Brasil entre 2017-2019. Doutora em Administraзгo pela Universidade Federal de Lavras, com foco em Gestгo Social, Ambiente e Desenvolvimento (2007). Possui mestrado em Administraзгo e Meio Ambiente - Wageningen University and Research Centrum (2003) e graduaзгo em Administraзгo de Empresas pela Universidade Federal de Lavras (2001). Atuou como Pesquisadora Junior no LEI - Instituto de Economia Agrнcola da Holanda (2002 a 2003). Atuou como Pesquisadora do PENSA - FEA/USP (2005 a 2007). Atuou como Coordenadora de Educaзгo Executiva no Insper (2007 a 2012). Atuou como professora em tempo parcial na FGV/EASP de 103 a 2015 e como professora de cursos de Educaзгo Executiva na FUNDACE, Unisinos, Newton Paiva, FIA, St Paul, GV-PEC e Insper. Tem experiкncia na бrea de Administraзгo, com кnfase em Estratйgia Organizacional e Sustentabilidade, atuando como pesquisadora nos seguintes temas: gestгo sуcio-ambiental, capitalismo consciente, responsabilidade social, recursos florestais e direitos de propriedade.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Dean of Undergraduate Education, Associate Professor, Coordinator of the Center for Sustainability and Business Studies at Insper. She holded the Escolhas Chair on Natural Environment (2016-2018) and was the co-chair of the PRME Brazil Chapter from 2017-2019.PhD in Administration from the Federal University of Lavras, with focus on Society, Environment and Development. She holds a Master of Science degree in Environmental Science from Wageningen University and Research Centrum (2002) and a bachelor degree in Business Administration from Universidade Federal de Lavras (2000). She worked as a Junior Researcher at LEI - the Dutch Economic and Agribusiness Research Center (2002 to 2003). She also worked as a Junior Researcher at PENSA - FEA / USP (2005 to 2007). From 2007 till 2012 she worked as Executive Education Coordinator at Insper (2007 to 2012). In education, she worked as a part-time faculty at FGV / EASP from 2013 till 2015, and as a lecturer in Executive Education Programs at FUNDACE, Unisinos, Newton Paiva, FIA, St Paul, GV-PEC and Insper. She has experience in the area of #8203;#8203;Administration, with emphasis on Organizational Strategy and Sustainability. Her research interest is on the following topics: sustainabilityt, conscious capitalism, social responsibility, forest resources and property rights, natural resources and urban centers.
